item.description:
Exorcising Preaching

 

Registration Required

Register by January 25, 2013, at www.ExorcisingPreaching.com.

 

This event is open to the public.

Friday, February 1, 2013, 9:00 AM – 11:30 AM. Andover Chapel, 45 Frances Ave.

Show on Harvard Gazette Preachers can be possessed by notions that cause harm. They can forget that no one is listening to them—the people are listening to that which is within and beyond. Some preachers believe that sermons should be written the night before they are preached. Poppycock! The art of sermon writing, and its performance, require a professional process and product. Harmful habits must be exorcised and replaced with healing disciplines that reawaken the craft of preaching. "Exorcising Preaching" promises to save the preacher by expelling unhealthy practices with gritty exorcises that liberate the preacher, the pulpit, and the people. The Rev. Nathan C. Walker is an award-winning preacher, senior minister of the First Unitarian Church of Philadelphia, and Resident Fellow at Harvard Divinity School.
item.name: Exorcising Preaching
